verses.name: Job 14:6
verses.text: Turn from him, that he may rest, till he shall accomplish, as an hireling, his day.

verses.name: Job 14:7
verses.text: For there is hope of a tree, if it be cut down, that it will sprout again, and that the tender branch thereof will not cease.

verses.name: Job 14:8
verses.text: Though the root thereof wax old in the earth, and the stock thereof die in the ground;

verses.name: Job 14:9
verses.text: Yet through the scent of water it will bud, and bring forth boughs like a plant.

verses.name: Job 14:10
verses.text: But man dieth, and wasteth away: yea, man giveth up the ghost, and where is he?
